description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Struggle your way to the top - or bottom - of the pile as you blast your way around the galaxy in this HUGE, no-holds-barred 3D space romp! Thousands of star systems in which to fight, trade and race, and an infinite number of challenging missions.  Can YOU compete?
description.short: Struggle your way to the top - or bottom - of the pile as you blast your way around the galaxy in this HUGE, no-holds-barred 3D space romp! Thousands of star systems in which to fight, trade and race, and an infinite number of challenging missions.  Can YOU compete?
